arStrings.szText: Casting a {c_important}Focus{/c} Skill recalls all Nearby {c_important}Spirit Feathers{/c} which deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage to enemies along their way. If there are no Nearby {c_important}Spirit Feathers{/c}, the cast instead spawns {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} randomly around you.

Casting a {c_important}Focus{/c} Skill recalls all Nearby {c_important}Spirit Feathers{/c} which deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage to enemies along their way. If there are no Nearby {c_important}Spirit Feathers{/c}, the cast instead spawns {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} randomly around you.
